segments.text: How far do we have to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The traffic is not very heavy on this high way , is it ? So I ’ m sure we ’ ll make it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but we ’ Ve got a hurry . It will be the rush hour soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . There ’ s plenty of time yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But it ’ s Friday today . This road is always jam packed during the weekend , isn ’ t it ?
segments.speaker: S2
